description.narrative: Output 2.2: By the end of 2021, MoE capacity is enhanced to implement priority national policies and strategies for improving quality of pre-primary through secondary., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Early Learning, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: By the end of 2021, disadvantaged children and adolescents have improved access to quality education and benefit from social services and judicial proceedings which promote their best interests

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF EDUCATION CENTER FOR INTERNATIONAL AFFAIRS AND SCHOOL ABROAD

sector.narrative: Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.

System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary teaching and learning environment (including curriculum and material design)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.2: By the end of 2021, MoE capacity is enhanced to implement priority national policies and strategies for improving quality of pre-primary through secondary.

description.narrative: UNICEF continued previous work to mainstream Life Skills and Citizenship Education into formal education. ICO continued to advocate for compulsory universal pre-primary education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/01/2020

title.narrative: Service Delivery - Emergency preparedness - Number of schools / communities developing and implementing DRR measures/plans with UNICEF support
Existence of strengthened resources and training package for pre-primary teachers.

actual.value: 2020:Technical discussion and advocacy with relevant stakeholders. 2020 target to be changed to = Availability of a study on the quality and effectiveness of pre-primary education.

title.narrative: Existence of a contextualized model for Life Skills Education in pre-primary, primary and secondary education levels with an emphasis on the most disadvantaged children

actual.value: 2020:Technical discussion and gap analysis conducted. It will be continued in 2020
